title: Task-Based Feedback Instruction for Utilizing Linear Algebra Symbolic Systems

context.prior_knowledge: Grasp of elementary linear algebra concepts and matrix operation experience
context.additional_context: A science-based job competency enhancement program for corporate managers/leaders, conducted asynchronously in a BYOD environment.

learning_goals: The structure and meaning of linear algebra symbol systems can be explained with over 80% accuracy
At least three practical problem-solving processes can be demonstrated by applying symbol system conversion rules
Feedback incorporation can improve task performance accuracy by over 30% compared to the initial level
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
